exercise.title: Average Temperatures
exercise.p:
Make a program that shows the average temperatures for Helsinki (the full year). Write that information to the console. Here is how you create an array object containing the average temperatures for all twelve months.
var temperatures = [-3.3, -4.7, -1.3, 3.9, 10.2, 14.6, 17.8, 16.3, 11.5, 6.6, 1.6, -2.0];

The idea of the code:
<body> <script type="text/javascript"> for (var i = 0; i < temperatures.length; i++) { // write to console: (i+1) + ". " + value at the i:th index } </script> </body>
Write the code into a script element inside of the body element
Use the console.log() method to write inside the for loop (repetition structure).
The toFixed(1) method call rounds the value to one decimal
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
